title: Eric Clapton - 1990-01-24 - Royal Albert Hall in London, England
description:
Eric Clapton
January 24, 1990
Royal Albert Hall
London, England


Source: Pre-FM > DAT
DAT > SHN: Tascam DA-30mkII > Zefiro ZA-2 > WinNT4 PC > CoolEdit 96 > CD Wave 1.9 > mkwACT 0.96f
 48.0 > 44.1kHz hardware conversion on-the-fly via Zefiro ZA-2



This DAT copy of the show shows no signs of FM broadcast, and had a few fades most
likely for placement of commercials.  This is probably a leaked broadcast tape.
The fades have been corrected to piece this back together again.


Eric Clapton		Guitar, Vocals 
Nathan East		Bass 
Greg Phillinganes	Keyboards 
Steve Ferrone		Drums
